reviews.text: The premises are furnished to a high standard and the ambience of the restaurant was very good. Plenty of table each set out not to close to each other as well as several horse shoe providing a little more private seating.
reviews.title: Very good premises and atmosphere but the meal didnt quite match.

reviews.text: The staff were very attentive and pleasant.
reviews.title: Great value meal

reviews.text: The meal we had, unfortunately was nothing better than average, we had fish pie which was lacking season of any description and tasted of potato only.
reviews.title: Sunday lunch

reviews.text: It was maybe the regular chefs night off, which can always happen, but we were slightly disappointed as we were expecting more due to previous reviews.
reviews.title: Very pleasantly surprised - would definitely recommend

reviews.text: We would go back but certainly not first choice as in Ayrshire we appear spoiled with choice of very good restaurants.
reviews.title: Portion control
